# About this notebook

This notebook includes 2 scripts:  
1. Process GHG flux data from gas chromatography  
2. Process CO<sub>2</sub> flux data from the Vaisala instrument

Packages used *plyr*, *dplyr*, *minpack.lm*, *readbulk*, and *GLDEX*. See citation at the end of script.
